opinion: Nice hole in the wall-ish restaurant in the heart of downtown LA
Just opened up a locarion in Burbank on San Fernando Road
This place is amazing, love eating here
The spice is nothing if youre used to spicy food
Any restaurant that plays Dick in a Box by SNL is Great to me! Lol
spicy did not hide the flavor
Price was a little ridiculous for the amount of food
Big bowl but little noodle or toppings
